system.description:
At 14th level, you gain the services of a draconic mount, either an ally you have bonded, a gift from your master, or a creature you have broken and bound to you. 

You may cast the find steed spell at 5th level without expending spell points once per long rest.

The steed you summon always has the stats of a giant lizard with the following changes: it is large, has an AC of 18, it is immune to your draconic damage type, you must choose to give it a fly speed instead of a swim speed, its type is dragon, it uses your spell attack bonus for any attacks it makes, and it gains a breath weapon action.  This breath weapon is a 30 foot cone and deals 5d6 damage your draconic damage type on a failure or half damage on a success, uses your warlock spell save DC, and can only be used once per short or long rest.
